content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

drop view if EXISTS bronze.view_partition_tripdata go 

create view bronze.view_partition_tripdata as 
select  result_set.filepath(1) as year, result_set.filepath(2) as month ,result_set.* 

from OPENROWSET(
    bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    data_source = 'logical_DWH_exDS',
    format = 'csv',
    HEADER_ROW = true,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)with(VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT)
as result_set go 

select * from bronze.view_partition_tripdata where year = '2021' and month = '07' go
